name: Fast Food (itch)
description:
Fast Food is a casual, fun-filled isometric racer for 4 players. Grab your burger and take to the tables of your local diner to duke it out over 3 relationship-destroying laps.

INCREDIBLE ACTION

Twist and turn your way through the narrow confines of the track while shoving your opponents out of the way. Let them know who's boss.

WEAPONS GALORE

Make your friends salty-as by peppering them with three shots of fries to go, unleash your inner-millennial by shooting Steve with smashed avocado pips (take that Steve, that's for stealing the last chicken nugget), or give events a saucy turn when you make things a bit too slick for your friends.

GLORIOUS ENVIRONMENT

Sick jumps that would make James Bond blush, hidden paths that are as sneaky as a snake oil salesman, and gorgeous tasty treats that will make your mouth water.

Will you stand as tall as a triple cheeseburger? Or eat your friend's cheeto dust?
